channel.title: Would someone be kind and help me with a small problem
channel.description: Well first off when I start up moparscape and i start my server it says you need to open it with batch file. And i downloaded moparscape from limewire and it worked just fine 2 days ago and now suddenly it wont let me on. So if you would be so kind and help me with this problem. :D :D[br][size=1]Posted at: November 06, 2006, 09:41:19 PM[/size][hr]I get how to do stuff on moparscape and stuff so please dont call me N00b and stuff. But please i will be very grateful[br][size=1]Posted at: November 06, 2006, 09:45:20 PM[/size][hr]anyone....is it to hard to fix???

item.title: Would someone be kind and help me with a small problem
item.dc:creator: @Rakan Rakan
item.description:
@Rakan wrote:

Just go Download it from www.moparscape.com and w8 for it to finish extracting… if u dont it will say <<<>>>>>>>>>>…

Read full topic

item.title: Would someone be kind and help me with a small problem
item.dc:creator: @XxX_Mod_XxX XxX Mod XxX
item.description:
@XxX_Mod_XxX wrote:

moparscape isnt coming up like it used to. You know how it says click any button to cont. and i do so and it just goes away and the moparscape w/ aryan isnt coming up i have to bring it up manually and i cant start the server. Im sorry this is taking so long but i thank you for your help.

Read full topic
item.source: Would someone be kind and help me with a small problem

item.title: Would someone be kind and help me with a small problem
item.dc:creator: @xlore6 xlore6
item.description:
@xlore6 wrote:

well when you open your file that you first downloaded (moparscape31.zip) you exracted the files. Now there should be a new folder (moparscape31) looks like reg. folder open it. Then you have to click another folder do so. Then there is a file called Runmoparscape ms-batch file. double click it and then clcik run. then your bot should come up along with moparscape 31w/aryan get it?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 06, 2006, 10:13:03 PM[/size][hr]or you can run moparscape from http://www.moparisthebest.com/ [br][size=1]Posted at: November 06, 2006, 10:16:03 PM[/size][hr]sorry if I didn’t help but i g2g

Read full topic
